Setup - Class in cli
Class Setup used to do initial game setup: obtain number of players, player names and save files

Instantiates a new setup
Ship - Class in logic
Class Ship contains all the information of a game ship

Instantiates a new Ship
shipOverlaps(int) - Method in class logic.Player
Checks if a given ship overlaps any other ship of the player
ships - Variable in class logic.Player
vector with pointers for the player's ships
Start - Class in cli
Class Start used to start the game and call the other classes
Start(Scanner, Random, String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class cli.Start
Instantiates a new Start
startGame() - Method in class logic.Game
Initiates the board for the opponents for each player, where bomb results will be registered
startingPlayer - Variable in class logic.Game
randomly determined player that gets the first turn (1 or 2)
state - Variable in class logic.Game
state of the game - 0 if not finished, 1 if player 1 wins, 2 if player 2 wins
state - Variable in class logic.Ship
vector with the state of each cell in the ship: false = dead, true = alive
symbol - Variable in class logic.Ship
symbol that identifies the ship, usually the first letter of the type, e.g.
